The most credible western presenter. Calling this as he sees it and not necessarily following popular narrative

"Most of them (WW2 veterans) won't even talk about what happened because the images are so horrific." In my youth I knew 3 veterans from WW2 very well, one who was in submarines and the other 2 who were in the Infantry. Those 2 both told me that they'd executed German POWs rather than tie up soldiers to march them back behind the lines for processing. It's not surprising that warfare is just as barbarous today as it was back then, but we're so much more aware of it now that there's instant video coverage of what's going on.
